sql.if: pms_attribute.id, pms_attribute.template_id, pms_attribute.name, pms_attribute.description, pms_attribute.type, pms_attribute.input_type, pms_attribute.value_list, pms_attribute.unit, pms_attribute.sort, pms_attribute.is_allow_customize

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pms_attribute INNER JOIN pms_attribute_template ON pms_attribute.template_id = pms_attribute_template.id INNER JOIN pms_category_attribute_template ON pms_attribute_template.id=pms_category_attribute_template.attribute_template_id INNER JOIN pms_category ON pms_category.id=pms_category_attribute_template.category_id INNER JOIN pms_spu ON pms_spu.category_id=pms_category.id WHERE pms_spu.id=#{spuId} AND pms_attribute.type=0 and pms_spu.is_deleted=0 and pms_spu.is_checked=1 and pms_spu.is_published=1

sql.if: pms_attribute.id, pms_attribute.name, pms_attribute.description, pms_attribute.type, pms_attribute.input_type, pms_attribute.value_list, pms_attribute.unit, pms_attribute.sort, pms_attribute.is_allow_customize, pms_attribute_template.id AS attribute_template_id, pms_attribute_template.name AS attribute_template_name, pms_attribute_template.pinyin AS attribute_template_pinyin, pms_attribute_template.keywords AS attribute_template_keywords

mapper.select:
select
from pms_attribute left join pms_attribute_template on pms_attribute.template_id=pms_attribute_template.id left join pms_category_attribute_template on pms_attribute_template.id=pms_category_attribute_template.attribute_template_id left join pms_category on pms_category.id=pms_category_attribute_template.category_id where pms_category.id=#{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_attribute (name, description, type, input_type, value_list, unit, sort, is_allow_customize, template_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{type}, #{inputType}, #{valueList}, #{unit}, #{sort}, #{allowCustomize}, #{templateId})
mapper.update:
update pms_attribute
template_id=#{templateId},
name=#{name},
description=#{description},
type=#{type},
input_type=#{inputType},
value_list=#{valueList},
unit=#{unit},
sort=#{sort},
is_allow_customize=#{allowCustomize},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pms_attribute LEFT JOIN pms_attribute_template ON pms_attribute_template.id=pms_attribute.template_id WHERE pms_attribute.id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM pms_attribute WHERE template_id=#{templateId} ORDER BY sort DESC, gmt_modified DESC

SELECT
FROM pms_attribute WHERE template_id=#{templateId} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY sort DESC, gmt_modified DESC
